item.description: Bigelow Hollow State Park is a beautiful wooded park with pristine lake, perfect for kayaking or swimming. They also allow other flotation devices, so even if you don't have a kayak, you can bring your tubes, floats or floating lounge chairs and linger on the lake! All are welcome to come back to my home in Ashford afterwards for a BBQ, some badminton or volleyball, and assorted board games. Admission to the park is $9 per car, so we could meet at my place first and car pool as much as possible.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Kayaking or swimming followed by BBQ and games
